import './Widget.css'; import {useState} from "react"; export const Widget = ({handleUpdateLayers}) => { const [inputValues, setInputValues] = useState({ intensity: 2, radiusPixels: 30, threshold: 0.03, }) const handleInputsChange = (event, type) => { inputValues[type] = +event.target.value; // const updatedValues = inputValues; handleUpdateLayers(inputValues); } return (
